entry.title: Mourning
entry.content: Strange; the luxury of silence amid the commotion of grief. That moment you slip among the trees to tell them your troubles; feeling normal is just around the corner yet unable to find its rhythm where you were last. I want to wake up and hear your laugh, see your smile or hear you tell me one more time to be myself. I want your wisdom and love bottled.

entry.title: I Came to Love
entry.content:
I came to love; came to the acceptance and freedom tucked inside home.
I came to love; came to soak in the warmth of those who don't share my blood yet hear my heart.
I came to love; came to hear her cadence her rhythm granting permission for mine to become softer slowly recalling southern roots.
I came to love; came to watch my nephews curiosity as they explore.
I came to love; came to hear his wisdom for further growing my faith as I continue my journey.
I came to love; came here in a community struggling to stand I came to love.

entry.title: Organically Grown Love
entry.content:
Fertilize tiny seeds of conversation
Ferment ideas with hopes and dreams
Seek what lies below the A-horizon
Plumb the depths of my mind with inquiries
Ask what countries I want to see; what languages I speak
Challenge me to continue becoming my highest self.

When you reach the B-horizon
Fertilize me with bone meal
Seek to speak my love language
Learn why Sundays are my favorite
Know that what I ask of you I ask of myself first

At the C-horizon
Become my partner in peace
Let us agree to never take things personally
Let us speak with integrity
In our ecosystem our word is bond

Let us create an environment where kindness and compassion
cross-pollinate with strength and ingenuity
Where seeds of knowledge become sprouts of wisdom harvested at the appointed time
Where the branches of our family tree drop fruits of the spirit in June

Imagine answering the ancestors call
Let us rebuild
My heart swears we can have it all

entry.title: I Am Here.
entry.content:
I am a survivor because I am here.
I am here refusing to shatter
Standing instead of splintering from the impact of abuse.

I am a warrior because I am here.
I am here refusing to break under the cruelty of your tongue.
I will let Karma deal with what you have done.

I will not take an eye for an eye and leave us both blind.
I will respect your humanity if you respect mine.

I am one who thrives because I am here.
I am here helping others; being a sister, a friend, a confidante,  a lover.
I thrive because I can forgive another.

The voice of your soul was strangled by the things you wished to own.
 Little did you know I was eager to give you a home.

I am a survivor because I am here.

entry.title: Ancestors Answered
entry.content:
Ancestors answered. Their words rooted in me. Food for when I have none. Fed from the fruits of their spirits. Led by voices that whisper. Acknowledging I must be still to hear it. 
Ancestors answered. Hours spent digesting their scrolls. Turning thoughts into action with pen strokes across life's page. Ancestors answered as I stand in the gap. Nourished from their sorrows and strengthened by their triumphs. On their shoulders I stand.
